about_the_game: In Bad Boro: Prologue you play as Tino in a quest to try and find out why he lost his memory. Uncover what is happening in the city of Badlerboro by helping a local rebel leader take out a nearby gang that's terrorizing the neighborhood! Bad Boro: Prologue includes fast paced combat, intense boss fights, and the climactic start to the Bad Boro story! Meticulous work is going into Hand Drawing every single art asset and Hand Animating every single frame in our stylized animation style. While not a shooter, we are embracing the twin-stick controller scheme and applying it to a brawler style game.
